pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fast R and C++ Access to NIfTI Images // Provides very fast read and write access to images stored in the NIfTI-1 and ANALYZE-7.5 formats, with seamless synchronisation between compiled C and interpreted R code. Also provides a simple image viewer, and a C/C++ API that can be used by other packages. Not to be confused with 'RNiftyReg', which performs image registration.
